pages.text: Dusts can be produced in the Grinder by processing certain items
Macerated Biomass is produced by grinding up Sugar Cane, Bamboo, or Kelp
Copper Dust is produced by grinding up a Copper Ingot (1 each), Raw Copper (1-2 each), or any Copper Ore (3-6 each)
Iron Dust is produced by grinding up Raw Iron (1-2 each) or any Iron Ore (3-6 each)
Gold Dust is produced by grinding up Raw Gold (1-2 each) or any Gold Ore (3-6 each)
